description: Access Spotify's music catalog and interact with tracks, albums, and artists.

capabilities.name: get_access_token
capabilities.description: Get a valid Spotify access token for API requests

capabilities.name: search
capabilities.description: Search for tracks, albums, artists, or playlists

capabilities.name: get_artist
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an artist

capabilities.name: get_multiple_artists
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for multiple artists

capabilities.name: get_artist_top_tracks
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's top tracks

capabilities.name: get_artist_related_artists
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information about artists similar to a given artist

capabilities.name: get_artist_albums
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's albums

capabilities.name: get_album
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an album

capabilities.name: get_album_tracks
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an album's tracks

capabilities.name: get_multiple_albums
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for multiple albums

capabilities.name: get_track
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for a track

capabilities.name: get_available_genres
capabilities.description: Get a list of available genres for recommendations

capabilities.name: get_new_releases
capabilities.description: Get a list of new album releases featured in Spotify

capabilities.name: get_recommendations
capabilities.description: Get track recommendations based on seed tracks, artists, or genres

capabilities.name: get_audiobook
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for an audiobook

capabilities.name: get_multiple_audiobooks
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information for multiple audiobooks

capabilities.name: get_audiobook_chapters
capabilities.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an audiobook's chapters

capabilities.name: get_playlist
capabilities.description: Get a playlist owned by a Spotify user

capabilities.name: get_playlist_tracks
capabilities.description: Get full details of the tracks of a playlist

capabilities.name: get_playlist_items
capabilities.description: Get full details of the items of a playlist

capabilities.name: modify_playlist
capabilities.description: Change a playlist's name and public/private state

capabilities.name: add_tracks_to_playlist
capabilities.description: Add one or more tracks to a playlist

capabilities.name: remove_tracks_from_playlist
capabilities.description: Remove one or more tracks from a playlist

capabilities.name: get_current_user_playlists
capabilities.description: Get a list of the playlists owned or followed by the current Spotify user

capabilities.name: get_featured_playlists
capabilities.description: Get a list of Spotify featured playlists

capabilities.name: get_category_playlists
capabilities.description: Get a list of Spotify playlists tagged with a particular category
